General.Name: Zhongshan Public Utilities Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhongshan Public Utilities Group Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the environmental water, solid waste, new energy, engineering construction, and auxiliary businesses in China and internationally. It is involved in the urban water supply and sewage treatment comprising water quality monitoring, engineering design, construction installation, information technology, and water treatment technology research and development and other related businesses; and financial investment, market operation, port passenger transportation, and other, as well as photovoltaic power generation, and electrochemical energy storage businesses. The company also engages in market leasing management; sale of materials; agency sale of tickets; small loan business; and provision of waste treatment and sanitation services. In addition, it undertakes municipal public construction, pipeline engineering, fire protection facility engineering, mechanical and electrical equipment installation engineering, building decoration, decoration engineering, and urban projects; and produces and supplies tap water, as well as manages properties. Further, the company offers waste incineration power generation and leachate treatment services; security brokerage and investment consulting services; financial advisory services related to security trading and securities investment services; and security underwriting and sponsorship, as well as securities self-operation and asset management services. The company was formerly known as Zhongshan Public Utilities Science and Technology Company Limited and changed its name to Zhongshan Public Utilities Group Co.,Ltd. in August 2008. Zhongshan Public Utilities Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, China.
